High.name: High
High.description: Total loss of confidentiality, or sensitive data.
High.exampleText: An admin's password might get leaked

Low.name: Low
Low.description: Access to restricted information could be obtained but the damage is limited.
Low.exampleText: User input is not validated before being processed by a software system.

None.name: None
None.description: No loss of confidentiality expected at all.
None.exampleText: The user somehow gets access to metadata when interacting with a system.
